name: Citizenship Classes
description: Need help preparing for your naturalization interview? Immigration Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) offers free Citizenship Classes in Redwood City or on Zoom! IIBA’s 12-week curriculum is focused on building English as a Second Language (ESL) skills while covering key topics on the naturalization test, such as U.S. government, history, and civics. Registration is required.

howToGetIt: To register or learn more about IIBA’s Citizenship Classes, please contact Glen Olson at golson@iibayarea.org or (650) 587-1549.
